vocabInfos.shortDef: to act in line with (the truth), act rightly be upright
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to act in line with (the truth), act rightly be upright
to walk in a straight course; to be straightforward, in moral conduct, Gal. 2:14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 行在正路上,
2) 隱喻. 行為正直 (加 2:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 行在正路上,
2) 隐喻. 行为正直 (加 2:14)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bước đi ngay thẳng; sống ngay thẳng
